job_history.work_description: Developing, revising and implementing policies and procedures as needed. Facilitates the patient complaint/grievance process, with positive patient experience. Making rounds to each unit daily, visit all new admissions and also identify patients' needs or issues and then visit the patients to advocate on their behalf.

Managed day to day operations with minimal supervision. Created reports, and Purchased office material. Performs complex, clerical services for the Intact Services. Provide clerical support to the team supervisor staff, delegated work flow.

Interact and act as a liaison with business clients, business partners, internal and external staff, and update share point sites. Review and certify system access for team members. Prepare agendas, materials; coordinate room/equipment reservations.

education.domain: Diverse Leaders Program CRA Best Practices Project

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.explanation: Developed, revised, and implemented policies and procedures as a Patient Advocate, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Facilitated the patient complaint/grievance process and made rounds to each unit daily as a Patient Advocate, suggesting strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Acted as a Team Lead in Operations and managed day-to-day operations with minimal supervision as an Office Support, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Interacted with business clients, business partners, internal and external staff, and updated SharePoint sites as an Operations Team Lead, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated room/equipment reservations and prepared agendas and materials as an Operations Team Lead, indicating some practical experience in project management.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed day-to-day operations with minimal supervision as an Office Support, indicating a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Pursued education in Human Resources Management and Healthcare Administration, indicating a solid understanding of human resources concepts.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Used Microsoft Office tools, such as SharePoint, to update sites and coordinate tasks, indicating a solid working proficiency.
